EmailTemplate.name: EISF Confirmation NonMember
EmailTemplate.subject: Open your membership today! Receive $100.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It was a pleasure to meet you at the Eastern Idaho State Fair today. You have officially been entered to win our custom Honda Ruckus*!
At Idaho Central Credit Union, our team is ready and willing to help you achieve financial success. Open a membership with checking today at iccu.com and receive $100**! Simply enter the promo code EISF100.
We have a solution to help you with all of your financial needs.
• Checking and Savings • Home Loans • Auto & RV Loans • Low-rate Visas, including Rewards • Free eBranch Online Banking • And much more
For more information, visit your local branch or iccu.com today!
*To view official rules click here. No purchase or membership necessary. One entry per person. Eligible participants must be 18 years of age or older and possess a valid form of identification. Form must be complete to be valid. All entries must be submitted by 9/10/2016. **To receive $100 you must obtain a checking account with debit card, eBranch, or Direct Deposit, and account must be opened with a $100 minimum balance. $100 to be deposited at time of obtaining at least one of the three services in conjunction with account opening. Must be a new Idaho Central member. Account must remain open for a minimum of six months from reward date or $25 will be deducted from account at closing. Limit one reward per person, per household. Membership required, based on eligibility. Offer ends 9/17/2016.
